sentences.sContent: Solomon Gills is in the act of seeing what time it is by the unimpeachable chronometer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Solomon Gills is in the act of seeing what time it is by the unimpeachable chronometer.
sentences.sCn: 所罗门·吉尔斯那时正在看他那只完美无缺的精密计时表，看看是什么时候了。

trans.tranOther: a very exact clock, used for scientific purposes
